message.en: Peering into the orb,{p=0.2} you assume the perspective of the [color=#ee8695]host[/color].
message.es: Peering into the orb,{p=0.2} you assume the perspective of the [color=#ee8695]host[/color].

message.en: [color=#ee8695]They're[/color] watching a news broadcast.{p=0.5} Another statistic,{p=0.2} another protest,{p=0.2} another life lost.
message.es: [color=#ee8695]They're[/color] watching a news broadcast.{p=0.5} Another statistic,{p=0.2} another protest,{p=0.2} another life lost.

message.en: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] an autonomous agent--that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] with the world.
message.es: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] an autonomous agent--that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] with the world.

message.en: Realizing [color=#ee8695]they[/color] can work to effect change,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] feels [color=#fbbbad]emboldened[/color].
message.es: Realizing [color=#ee8695]they[/color] can work to effect change,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] feels [color=#fbbbad]emboldened[/color].

message.en: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they[/color] can find relief in others--that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] capable of experiencing joy.
message.es: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they[/color] can find relief in others--that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] capable of experiencing joy.

message.en: Being on the cusp of a weekend,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] feels [color=#fbbbad]excited[/color] to meet others.
message.es: Being on the cusp of a weekend,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] feels [color=#fbbbad]excited[/color] to meet others.

message.en: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that such turmoil can be braced with others:{p=0.2} friends and family alike.
message.es: You remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that such turmoil can be braced with others:{p=0.2} friends and family alike.

message.en: Perhaps,{p=0.2} they could identify some shared,{p=0.2} communal consciousness.
message.es: Perhaps,{p=0.2} they could identify some shared,{p=0.2} communal consciousness.

message.en: Feeling as if [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] backed by a community,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is [color=#fbbbad]reinvigorated[/color].
message.es: Feeling as if [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] backed by a community,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is [color=#fbbbad]reinvigorated[/color].

message.en: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is being proactive now...{p=0.2} We can effect change!
message.es: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is being proactive now...{p=0.2} We can effect change!

message.en: There can't be much left.{p=0.5} Let's keep going.
message.es: There can't be much left.{p=0.5} Let's keep going.
